Uses of Interface
htsjdk.samtools.BAMIndex

  • Packages that use BAMIndex 
    Package Description
    htsjdk.samtools  

    • Uses of BAMIndex in htsjdk.samtools

      Subinterfaces of BAMIndex in htsjdk.samtools 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  BrowseableBAMIndex
      An index interface with additional functionality for querying and inspecting the structure of a BAM index.
      Classes in htsjdk.samtools that implement BAMIndex 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractBAMFileIndex
      Provides basic, generic capabilities to be used reading BAM index files.
      class  SRAIndex
      Emulates BAM index so that we can request chunks of records from SRAFileReader Here is how it works: SRA allows reading of alignments by Reference position fast, so we divide our "file" range for alignments as a length of all references.
      Methods in htsjdk.samtools that return BAMIndex 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BAMIndex CRAMFileReader.getIndex() 
      BAMIndex SAMFileReader.getIndex()
      Deprecated. 
      Retrieves the index for the given file type.
      BAMIndex SRAFileReader.getIndex() 
      BAMIndex SamReader.Indexing.getIndex()
      Retrieves the index for the given file type.
      BAMIndex SamReader.PrimitiveSamReader.getIndex() 
      BAMIndex SamReader.PrimitiveSamReaderToSamReaderAdapter.getIndex()
